name: Galactic TD
description:
Currently working on a HTML5 conversion of the original Starland TD game, called Galactic TD.

Right now you can only play in single player mode, either in Simulation (like you would in a real game but just yourself) or in Practice mode.

Multiplayer will come much later on.

Still some graphical issues, also no sound.

Still a WIP.

Controls:

Left click to interact (place/sell/upgrade towers)

While a tower is selected, Shift + S/U will Sell/Upgrade

Come join the discord!

-eragnarok

Changelog:

8/12/2022:

Added in mirror mode for simulation
Added fast mode
